thread.title: INC. MEDIA INVITES READERS TO BECOME 'INSIDERS'
thread.title_full: INC. MEDIA INVITES READERS TO BECOME 'INSIDERS'

author: admin
title: INC. MEDIA INVITES READERS TO BECOME 'INSIDERS'
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 12:50 PM   Inc. Media 
NEW YORK, Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Inc. Media, publisher of Inc. Magazine, today unveiled Inc. Insider, a new membership program designed to give members special access to exclusive content, superstar speakers, and networking events for making invaluable connections to Inc. editors and fellow entrepreneurs. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279035LOGO 
Inc. "Insiders" will enjoy these benefits: -- MEMBER-ONLY EVENTS at Inc.: Twice a year, Inc. Insider members are invited to network, toast, learn and meet - with each other and Inc. editors. -- PRIORITY SERVICE: Inc. Insiders enjoy prioritized email and phone access for all things Inc. They can take the express lane for ordering awards, registering for events, and other connections. -- PRIVATE EVENTS AT INC. CONFERENCES: For the fastest-growing private companies, the acclaimed Inc. Conferences are the must attends, from the Inc. 5000 to Growco and Iconic. Insiders will gather for a members-only networking cocktail set up in their honor at every conference. -- BUSINESS-BUILDING TOOLS: Inc. Insiders have exclusive access to key business tools, including benchmarking data, loan advisory services and online courses. -- LOW INSIDER RATES: From conferences and classes to award programs and advertising packages, Inc. Insiders are guaranteed the "Friends and Family" rate - typically a savings of 30% -- or even more. -- INC. SOURCE: Insiders get listed on, and have access to, Inc.'s comprehensive database of entrepreneurial leaders and topic experts. Inc. Source is the go-to place for reporters and researchers. 
Inc. Insider membership is $89.99 a month. More information can be found at inc.com/insider 
"Inc. Insider is an extension of what we have long done at Inc. events and in the pages of Inc.com and Inc. Magazine: Provide access to the most inspiring people and best advice in entrepreneurship today," said Eric Schurenberg. "Insider simply provides more of that access, in more curated form, for Inc. users who really value it." 
About Inc. Media: 
Founded in 1979 and acquired in 2005 by Mansueto Ventures, Inc. is the only major brand dedicated exclusively to owners and managers of growing private companies, with the aim to deliver real solutions for today's innovative company builders. Winner of the National Magazine Award for General Excellence in both 2014 and 2012. Total monthly audience reach for the brand has grown significantly from 2,000,000 in 2010 to over 13,000,000 today. For more information, visit www.inc.com . 
Media Contact: Drew Kerr, Inc. Media, 212-849-8250, drew@four-corners.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Inc. Media
